title: Sethan
content:
reataxeLevel 6 Evocation Spell

Sethan: ReduceLevel 2 Transmutation Spell

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

When this are careens through the air toward an unfortunate head — the whistle of its spiritual counterpart is never far behind.

Greataxe Two-Handed

Sethan is one of the Greataxe Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Sethan is an enchanted axe that allows the user to cast Spiritual Weapon and Reduce. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse,
